description: TRIPLE GOLD 30 WP is a selective pre-emergence and post-emergence herbicide containing Bispyribac Sodium 20% and Pyrazosulfuron-ethyl 10%. It is a broad-spectrum herbicide that effectively controls grasses, sedges, and broadleaf weeds in rice fields. The product is rapidly absorbed by weed roots and leaves after application, spreading throughout the plant to affect both annual and perennial weeds. It should be applied when weeds are at the 2-4 leaf stage for optimal effectiveness.
application_rates: 150 gm/ha (150 grams per hectare); 60 gm/acre (60 grams per acre); 20 gm/bigha (20 grams per bigha - 33 decimal); Mix 0.3-0.5 grams per liter of water
side_effect: Do not smell, swallow or drink while spraying. Do not spray against the wind or on your feet. Wash your body and clothes thoroughly after spraying. Bury the used packages in the fallow land.
crops_pests: Rice - Weeds (C. dactylon, E. crus-galli, M. vaginalio, S. Maritimus, C. difformis)
pest: Weeds, C. dactylon, E. crus-galli, M. vaginalio, S. Maritimus, C. difformis
symptoms: Weed infestation causing competition for nutrients, water, and sunlight, leading to reduced crop yield and quality
causes: Broadleaf weeds and grasses competing with rice crops for resources
